org.epochx.life
Class LifeCycleManager

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.life.LifeCycleManager

public class LifeCycleManager
extends java.lang.Object

The Life Cycle system in EpochX is managed by an instance of this class. Users of this class are either event listeners or event providers.

Event listeners

Objects that are interested in listening for life cycle events should use the set of addXxxListener(XxxListener) methods. In most circumstances it is beneficial to use an anonymous implementation of one of the abstract XxxAdapter classes.

For example, to perform an action at the end of each generation: 

 LifeCycleManager.getLifeCycleManager().addGenerationListener(new GenerationAdapter() {
                public void onGenerationEnd() {
                        ... do something ...
                }
 });

Event providers

For the most part, events are generated by the EpochX framework itself. Events are raised with a call to one of the fireXxxEvent methods. This will trigger a distribution of the event to all appropriate listeners.

Constructor Summary
LifeCycleManager()
          Construct a new life cycle manager.

fireInitialisationEvent

public java.util.List<CandidateProgram> fireInitialisationEvent(java.util.List<CandidateProgram> pop)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the current population, that new population will then become the argument to all subsequent listeners, and the population returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. If any of the listeners returns null then no further listeners will be informed and null will be returned from this method.

Parameters:
pop - a population of CandidatePrograms.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given pop, a different or modified list of CandidatePrograms or null.

fireInitialisationEndEvent

public void fireInitialisationEndEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireElitismStartEvent

public void fireElitismStartEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireElitismEvent

public java.util.List<CandidateProgram> fireElitismEvent(java.util.List<CandidateProgram> elites)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the current set of elites, those programs will then become the argument to all subsequent listeners, and the elites returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. No listeners may return null.

Parameters:
elites - a population of CandidatePrograms chosen as elites.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given elites, a different or modified list of CandidatePrograms.

fireElitismEndEvent

public void fireElitismEndEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

firePoolSelectionEvent

public java.util.List<CandidateProgram> firePoolSelectionEvent(java.util.List<CandidateProgram> pool)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the current pool of programs, those programs will then become the argument to all subsequent listeners, and the pool returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. If any of the listeners returns null then no further listeners will be informed and null will be returned from this method.

Parameters:
pool - a population of CandidatePrograms chosen as a breeding pool.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given pool, a different or modified list of CandidatePrograms.

Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireCrossoverStartEvent

public void fireCrossoverStartEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireCrossoverEvent

public CandidateProgram[] fireCrossoverEvent(CandidateProgram[] parents,
                                             CandidateProgram[] children)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the current child programs, those programs will then become the child argument to all subsequent listeners, and the children returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. If any of the listeners returns null then no further listeners will be informed and null will be returned from this method.

Parameters:
parents - an array of CandidatePrograms which underwent crossover.
children - an array of CandidatePrograms which are the result of a crossover operation on the parents.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given children, or potentially an array of entirely different CandidatePrograms. null is also a valid return value.

fireCrossoverEndEvent

public void fireCrossoverEndEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireMutationStartEvent

public void fireMutationStartEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireMutationEvent

public CandidateProgram fireMutationEvent(CandidateProgram parent,
                                          CandidateProgram child)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the child, that program will then become the child argument to all subsequent listeners, and the program returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. If any of the listeners returns null then no further listeners will be informed and null will be returned from this method.

Parameters:
parent - a CandidateProgram which underwent mutation.
child - a CandidateProgram which is the result of a mutation operation on the parent.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given child, or potentially an entirely different CandidateProgram. null is also a valid return value.

public void fireMutationEndEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireReproductionEvent

public CandidateProgram fireReproductionEvent(CandidateProgram program)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the child, that program will then become the child argument to all subsequent listeners, and the program returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. If any of the listeners returns null then no further listeners will be informed and null will be returned from this method.

Parameters:
program - a CandidateProgram which was selected for reproduction.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given program, or potentially an entirely different CandidateProgram. null is also a valid return value.

public void fireReproductionEndEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireGenerationStartEvent

public void fireGenerationStartEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.

fireGenerationEvent

public java.util.List<CandidateProgram> fireGenerationEvent(java.util.List<CandidateProgram> pop)
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. Each listener has the opportunity to return a value to replace the population, those programs will then become the pop argument to all subsequent listeners, and the programs returned by the final listener will be returned from this method. If any of the listeners returns null then no further listeners will be informed and null will be returned from this method.

Parameters:
pop - a list of CandidatePrograms which were the result of an evolutionary generation.
Returns:
the response from the listeners which may be the given pop, or potentially a list of entirely different CandidatePrograms. null is also a valid return value.

fireGenerationEndEvent

public void fireGenerationEndEvent()
Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type.
